participant_1.background:
I am more concerned about my physical comfort than my appearance.
I like to go for walks around my new neighborhood after work, exploring the area and making new friends.
My appearance is not that important to me, as I would rather focus on my passions and relationships.
i cannot stand beets.
My parents are very supportive and understanding, even though I'm not the best at managing my finances.

participant_2.background:
I'm worried about my kids getting sick because of the cold weather.
i broke my nose in 5th grade.
i often spend my free time engaging in activism work with friends and family.
i met my birth mother when i was sixteen.
i drive a restored mustang.

content.text: Hi! I'm a 25-year-old woman from California. I'm a social worker and I live with my boyfriend. I love to read and go for walks. I'm also an avid animal lover.
Hello! I'm a 30-year-old man from New York. I'm a firefighter and I live with my wife and two kids. I love to play video games and I'm a big fan of football. I'm also an avid car enthusiast.
Nice to meet you! What kind of activism work do you do?
I'm involved in a lot of different causes, but I mostly focus on environmental issues. I'm also a big supporter of animal rights.
That's great! I'm also a big animal lover. I have two dogs and a cat.
Nice! I have a dog and a cat too.
What kind of car do you drive?
I have a restored Mustang. It's a 1969 model.
Wow, that sounds really cool! I've always wanted a classic car.
It's a lot of fun to drive.
I bet! Do you have any plans for the weekend?
Not really, I'm just going to relax and spend time with my family.
Sounds like a good plan. I'm going to go to the park with my dogs.
